sentences.en: "Fourteen minutes," Chris said, taking a peep at his watch.
sentences.cn: “14分钟,”克里斯瞥了一眼他的手表说道.

sentences.en: A group of students filed in, fourteen or fifteen all told.
sentences.cn: 一队学生鱼贯而入, 共有十四五个人.

sentences.en: At the age of fourteen John really began to sprout up.
sentences.cn: 约翰在14岁时真正开始发育.

sentences.en: Everybody in the club looked to be fourteen years old.
sentences.cn: 俱乐部里的人个个看起来都像14岁的模样。

sentences.en: He couldn't have been more than fourteen years old.
He reached puberty at the age of fourteen.
He spent the last fourteen years of his life in retirement.
sentences.cn: 他一生中最后的14年是在退休中度过的。

sentences.en: He used to work fourteen hours a day.
sentences.cn: 他过去一天工作14个小时。

sentences.en: I put the weight at about fourteen pounds.
sentences.cn: 我估计它的重量大约为14磅.

sentences.en: I started playing the guitar when I was fourteen (= 14 years old ) .
In 1861, they managed to place fourteen women in paid positions in the colonies.
sentences.cn: 他们在1861年设法把14名女性安排到殖民地有报酬的职位上。

sentences.en: Remember he's just fourteen years old.
She spent fourteen years in retailing.
That is enough to pay the start-up costs for fourteen research projects.
sentences.cn: 那足够用来支付14个科研项目的启动费用了。

sentences.en: The smaller lake ranges from five to fourteen feet in depth.
sentences.cn: 小一些的湖深度从5英尺到14英尺不等。

sentences.en: The wound was closed with fourteen stitches.
The youngest child, John, was to die at the age of fourteen.
sentences.cn: 最小的孩子约翰后来于14岁时夭亡。

words.tran_cn: 第十四；月的第十四日；十四分之一

trans.tran_cn: 十四的记号，十四岁，十四点钟，十五世纪
